key_findings.mae_optuna_vs_mse_params: MSE-tuned params with MAE loss (0.5380) BEAT Optuna MAE params (0.5371). Optimal hyperparams are loss-agnostic.
key_findings.smoter_optuna_disappointing: Joint Optuna found pct=86/mult=1 (conservative). 0.5358 vs simple SMOTER p85/x3 = 0.5388. Optuna explored too conservatively.
key_findings.conclusion: Optuna re-tuning for alternative losses does NOT help. The V13/V14 MSE-tuned params are already near-optimal across loss functions.

killed_before: LGB MAE Optuna, multi-seed ensemble, blending
